医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究强调感染是 CAR-T 治疗后的主要挑战据介绍，在弥漫性大 B 细胞非霍奇金淋巴瘤 (DLBCL) 患者中，两周后嵌合抗原受体 (CAR)-T 治疗后的两个标志性毒性极为罕见，因此支持更短、更灵活的毒性监测期发表在《血液进展》上的一项研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/Study-highlights-infection-as-major-post-CAR-T-therapy-challenge.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/Study-highlights-infection-as-major-post-CAR-T-therapy-challenge.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5f158c1f-f27c-4293-8c06-054ca19d0005 Thu, 25 Jul 2024 02:21:04 -0400 Study highlights infection as major post-CAR-T therapy challenge
处方做法和家长意识的变化导致青少年吸毒减少密歇根大学的一项新研究发现，自 2009 年以来，美国高中生报告说，三种最常为青少年开处方和滥用的受控药物的医疗使用、滥用和可用性急剧下降。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/Changes-in-prescribing-practices-and-parental-awareness-contribute-to-teen-drug-decline.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/Changes-in-prescribing-practices-and-parental-awareness-contribute-to-teen-drug-decline.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d82f2aed-af24-4258-9134-d87712565b52 Thu, 25 Jul 2024 01:45:27 -0400 Changes in prescribing practices and parental awareness contribute to teen drug decline
前所未有的脑细胞图谱揭示了阿尔茨海默病不到十年前，当 Hansruedi Mathys 博士启动了一个雄心勃勃的项目，要创建一个包含 100 个单独脑细胞内存储的所有基因读数的带注释库时，这项任务令人畏惧。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/Unprecedented-brain-cell-mapping-sheds-light-on-Alzheimers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/Unprecedented-brain-cell-mapping-sheds-light-on-Alzheimers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f50104d3-d085-462a-8775-57b38feaa64f Thu, 25 Jul 2024 01:39:44 -0400 Unprecedented brain cell mapping sheds light on Alzheimer's
微小的肌动蛋白突变与发育性心脏缺陷和成人心房颤动有关数百万成年人患有心房颤动 -；心脏上腔的不规则跳动会增加心力衰竭、中风和死亡的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/Tiny-titin-mutation-linked-to-developmental-heart-defects-and-adult-atrial-fibrillation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/Tiny-titin-mutation-linked-to-developmental-heart-defects-and-adult-atrial-fibrillation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=12e2ad62-eb4d-4e4e-81db-87ce11e5b185 Thu, 25 Jul 2024 01:32:00 -0400 Tiny titin mutation linked to developmental heart defects and adult atrial fibrillation
阿尔茨海默病脑组织的综合分析确定了新的生物标志物从研究人类基因组，到分析蛋白质编码方式，或监测 RNA 表达，研究人员正在迅速对痴呆症的复杂遗传和细胞机制有了更丰富的了解。但有一个问题：虽然新技术正在揭示阿尔茨海默氏症研究的无数途径，但我们不可能提前知道哪些研究途径将带来有效的治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/Compressive-analysis-of-Alzheimere28099s-brain-tissue-identizes-novel-biomarkers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/Compressive-analysis-of-Alzheimere28099s-brain-tissue-identizes-novel-biomarkers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4a9fe3a3-2b8d-4847-ab64-3d3461af2ac0 Thu, 25 Jul 2024 01:24:16 -0400 Comprehensive analysis of Alzheimer’s brain tissue identifies novel biomarkers
对 p16 蛋白的新见解可能会促进癌症诊断和治疗的进步基督城奥塔哥大学的研究人员率先发现了一种蛋白质功能，该功能有可能指导新型癌症治疗方案的开发并改善各种癌症的诊断。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/New-insights-into-p16- Protein-could-lead-to-advances-in-cancer-diagnosis-and-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/New-insights-into-p16- Protein-could-lead-to-advances-in-cancer-diagnosis-and-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a0f9fd14-4add-4d31-b994-905f4446388c Thu, 25 Jul 2024 01:17:20 -0400 New insights into p16 protein could lead to advances in cancer diagnosis and treatment
基因变异预测中风后认知能力下降加州大学洛杉矶分校健康中心领导的新研究发现，特定基因可能与中风幸存者的康复轨迹有关，这为医生提供了有助于开发靶向治疗的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/Gene-variant-predicts-cognitive-decline-after-中风.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/Gene-variant-predicts-cognitive-decline-after-中风.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cddb4d27-4db7-4f95-b28e-55fecc170646 Thu, 25 Jul 2024 01:11:37 -0400 Gene variant predicts cognitive decline after stroke
十六名加沙儿童抵达西班牙接受紧急治疗来自加沙的 16 名病情复杂的人将于今天通过世界卫生组织 (WHO) 和多个合作伙伴参与的疏散程序抵达西班牙接受护理。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/Sixteen-children-from-Gaza-arrive-in-Spain-for-urgent-medical-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/Sixteen-children-from-Gaza-arrive-in-Spain-for-urgent-medical-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=282a15ec-af0f-4008-9cc6-699e779f538a Thu, 25 Jul 2024 01:03:18 -0400 Sixteen children from Gaza arrive in Spain for urgent medical treatment
脐带血库行业因未经证实的说法和高成本而面临审查《英国医学杂志》今天发表的一项调查显示，一些英国私人生物银行可能会误导准父母，让他们相信储存脐带血对于治疗孩子未来可能出现的危及生命的疾病的价值。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/Cord-blood-banking-industry-faces-scrutiny-over-unproven-claims-and-high-costs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/Cord-blood-banking-industry-faces-scrutiny-over-unproven-claims-and-high-costs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d4f77b7f-a65e-4a17-8068-9ffc004f60bd Thu, 25 Jul 2024 00:59:57 -0400 Cord blood banking industry faces scrutiny over unproven claims and high costs
联合国报告显示饥饿率停滞不前，粮食不安全加剧根据联合国五个专门机构今天发布的最新《世界粮食安全和营养状况》(SOFI) 报告，到 2023 年，约有 7.33 亿人面临饥饿，相当于全球人口的十一分之一和非洲人口的五分之一。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/UN-report-shows-stagnant-hunger-rates-and-rising-food-insecurity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/UN-report-shows-stagnant-hunger-rates-and-rising-food-insecurity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bc02ce7a-e639-45d1-a12b-c8b28b492cfa Thu, 25 Jul 2024 00:57:28 -0400 UN report shows stagnant hunger rates and rising food insecurity
